casebody.data:
COLUMBUS CITY SCHOOLS BD. OF EDN.
v.
FRANKLIN CTY. BD. OF REVISION. 2015-1403 Supreme Court of Ohio. February 27, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

On joint motion to remand in order to implement a settlement. Motion granted. The cause is remanded to the Board of Tax Appeals to take further action as appropriate.
